GeochemXYDiagram.name: Porphyry Cu Prospectivity (La/Sm)n vs (Dy/Yb)n
GeochemXYDiagram.Comment: Comparison of ratios of normalised LREE/MREE (La/Sm)n to normalised MREE/HREE (Dy/Yb)n as a discriminant of hornblende (+/- titanite) vs. garnet frationation/restite. Normalisation values from Sun and McDonough (1989).
GeochemXYDiagram.Reference: Richards et al., 2012, High Sr/Y Magmas Reflect Arc Maturity, High Magmatic Water Content, and Porphyry Cu +/- Mo +/- Au Potential: Examples from the Tethyan Arcs of Central and Eastern Iran and Western Pakistan, Economic Geology, v.107, pp. 310, Fig 9b
